song_name: Kokiri Forest - Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time
metrics_conclusion: Kokiri Forest - Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity.
key_conclusion: Kokiri Forest - Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Mixolydian,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
